Sentencas: INTERACTION OF SMALL ATOMS WITH TRANSITION METAL CLUSTERS.
Titulo: INTERACTION OF SMALL ATOMS WITH TRANSITION METAL CLUSTERS

Sentencas: Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations on the interactions of small atoms (H, C, O, and S) on first-row transition metal clusters were performed.
Titulo: INTERACTION OF SMALL ATOMS WITH TRANSITION METAL CLUSTERS

Sentencas: The results show that the adsorption site may vary between the metal surface and the edge of the cluster.
Titulo: INTERACTION OF SMALL ATOMS WITH TRANSITION METAL CLUSTERS

Sentencas: The adsorption energies, adatom-nearest neighbor and adatom-metal plane distances were also determined.
Titulo: INTERACTION OF SMALL ATOMS WITH TRANSITION METAL CLUSTERS

Sentencas: Finally, the authors present a discussion about the performance of these metals as anodes on solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: INTERACTION OF SMALL ATOMS WITH TRANSITION METAL CLUSTERS

Sentencas: The results obtained agree with empirical data, indicating that the theoretical model used is adequate.
Titulo: INTERACTION OF SMALL ATOMS WITH TRANSITION METAL CLUSTERS
